item_condition.description: If specified, only items that fulfills this condition will be prevented from being used.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only items that fulfills this condition will be prevented from being used.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Prevents the player from using items (right-click action such as eating food or using a shield, placing them as blocks will still work).

Type ID: `origins:prevent_item_use`
